name: Small ball bounce
description:
Warning, highly addictive game that you can´t just get enough of when you start playing!
Tap to slap the ball down, bounce it to the ground and avoid the obstacles,
well there is nothing much else to it really
However, this simple game description is very simple to read and understand,
but could you score like 3 or 400 just like that?
Well, there is only one way to find it out, play "the game" Small Ball Bounce
and compete with players from all over the world about the best score!
